overview: Jay Hall was the co-Founder and visionary force behind ChemConnect, the leading Internet marketplace serving the global chemical and plastics industry. Jay held a number of positions while at ChemConnect, including Chairman of the Board, and was instrumental in raising over $105MM from a variety of top-tier Venture Capitalists as well as over 40 Major Chemical companies. Prior to ChemConnect, Jay held various executive roles and served as a Director for Mayo Chemical Company, a specialty chemical manufacturing and distribution business. Previously, Jay spent four years working as a development engineer and manager for AT&T/Lucent Technologies supporting the deployment of the 5ESS and other network switching equipment in key international markets. Jay holds a Master’s degree in electrical engineering from the Georgia Institute of Technology where he studied advanced communication theory and digital signal processing.
